name: ABC Monday Night Football
overview: The only thing we left out is the cooler of Gatorade. Hard hitting graphics and play-by-play sound bring every grunt and groan to life. Chalkboards of pro-designed offensive and defensive plays. "Super Play" mode zooms to a close-up of the action. 28 prime-time teams with their own personality and field prowess. Relive the action with instant replay. Monitor player stats and save them with the "Super Save Stats" feature.
